SYSTEM: Master_I_AI_Terminology_in_ontologies_28-10-09%284%29.pdf: Página 39
39
Types of lexicons
• Various types:
– Morphosyntactic Information :  
http://www.mat.upm.es/~aries/description.html
http://www.ims.uni-stuttgart.de/projekte/CorpusWorkbench/CQP- 
HTMLDemo/PennTreebankTS.html
– Semantic Information:
• Semantic features: human being, animate, human, physical object, mental 
object
• Different entries for different senses
• Semantic relations: synonyms, quasi-synonyms, antonyms, etc.
• Hierarchical relations: part_of, kind_of, etc…
– Syntactic-semantic Information : colocations
– Information about a domain
– Definitions
speaker: SYSTEM
